testcase.description: This rule evaluates whether the dimension default is associated with a given axis in the companyâ€™s extension taxonomy. Companies should not change the default member defined in the US GAAP Taxonomy for a given axis in their extension taxonomy.\n
testcase.ruleMessage: The dimension default defined for the axis in the US GAAP taxonomy should not be changed in a company extension taxonomy. The default for the ${axis_name} in the base taxonomy is ${axis_default_name}, but the default has been replaced with ${def_name}.

variation.name: Creates a fail case when a dimension default defined in the company extension is different from that defined in the US GAAP taxonomy.
variation.description: The default for the InvestmentTypeAxis (in the us-gaap taxonomy) in the base taxonomy is InvestmentTypeCategorizationMember (in the us-gaap taxonomy), but has been replaced with InvestmentDomain (in the invest taxonomy).
